eu_initiatives: onderwijs, voornamelijk professionele opleidingen, opleiding voor jonge en oudere werklozen
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
People management and leadership programme  
 
Global is organising unique people management and leadership programme in Brussels whereby civil servants and managers are confronted with world authorities from no less than 5 of Europe’s leading business schools:   
 
Insead, London Business School, Saïd at Oxford University, Esade Barcelona, London School of Economics.  
 
Never before have top experts from those 5 prestigious business schools been brought together in an exclusive programme
